# Import data

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(umiAnalyzer)

samples <- params$samples
assays <- params$assays
data <- params$data
```

UMI-based sequencing data processed with umi-error-correct was analysed in the umiVisualiser
shiny app. Data for the following samples and assays will be shown:

```{r}
samples
assays
```

# Amplicons plots

```{r}
simsen <- generateAmpliconPlots(
  object = data,
  filter.name = "user_filter",
  do.plot = TRUE,
  amplicons = assays,
  samples = samples)
```
